basics.name: Sarang Khedar
basics.summary: Sarang is a Test Automation Engineer with more than 10 years testing experience. He has a passion for learning new technologies and exploring the latest test automation tools and practices.  He brings a keen interest and go-hard attitude for challenging assignments, POC's and is a successful lead as well as Individual Contributor. He is a certified SAFe Practitioner, and a test automation expert for Web/Desktop/Mobile/API with experience in all phases of Quality Assurance Lifecycle. Sarang has proven expertise in developing and maintaining test automation frameworks for Web, Mobile and API applications. He has also worked in a COE team for designing and defining best practices to develop and maintain test automation frameworks for functional and performance testing.

highlights: •	Developed end to end functional test automation framework using Cypress.io, and javascript, mochawesome reporting.
•	Test execution on different test environments using Bamboo and slack integration.
•	Developing Automation scripts using Cypress.io, filters file system, json, POM, Data-Driven.
•	Optimisation and improvement in test scripts execution as per feedback received by daily execution of scripts.
•	Involved in unit testing using jest framework.
work.projectdescription: Sydney Opera House / automation of SOH ticket booking application

highlights: •	POC of consumer plus(Gift cards) module automation using cypress automation framework and Docker parallelisation.
•	Worked as a QA member in scrum team who is responsible for end to end testing of user stories/features and its automation.
•	Manual validation of defects, it’s automation and reporting using Jira.
work.projectdescription: Zip.co / automation of Consumer plus(Gift cards)

highlights: •	Responsible for Quality Engineering activities in Scrum team adopting SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework) principles for product development
•	Test Enumeration of all the new User stories and functionalities lined up for a given Program Increment and Iteration.

•	Coverage of all Stories from all aspects of Agile Test quadrants for Test scenario generation – Unit tests (Q1), Functional automated Tests (Q2), User Acceptance/System test (Q3) and Non-functional (Q4)
•	Authoring functional BDD automation test scripts using Cucumber, selenium web driver and java.
improvement in coverage or functional changes
•	Collaborating to resolve the defects on time and providing continuous feedback to the stakeholders.

certifications.summary: - ISTQB Certified Tester Foundation Level CTFL 2018
